alert.note: Alert for Central Sacramento Valley; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued April 02 at 1:54PM PDT until April 04 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PDT MONDAY... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For Monday`s Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 28 to 36 will result in frost formation. For Tuesday`s Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 29 to 35 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Areas below 2000 feet including Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County, Northern and Central Sacramento Valley, Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County and Northeast Foothills. * WHEN...For Monday`s Frost Advisory, from 2 AM to 9 AM PDT Monday. For Tuesday`s Frost Advisory, from 2 AM to 9 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold temperatures Monday and Tuesday mornings will allow for area of frost.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central Sacramento Valley; Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
